translations: 停止（cease 的第三人称单数）；终了

sentences.sentence: When the stem dies, its hormone signal also ceases.
sentences.translation: 当茎死亡时，它的激素信号也停止了。

sentences.sentence: There will eventually come a day when The New York Times ceases to publish stories on newsprint.
sentences.translation: 总有一天，《纽约时报》会停止在纸质版刊登新闻报道。

sentences.sentence: With compulsory education from the age of five or six, her role as chief educator of her children soon ceases.
sentences.translation: 随着义务教育从五岁或六岁开始，她作为教育她孩子的角色很快停止了。
